body:
Hi Giulio,

thanks!

Both solutions are a question of calculation time... but I use the
second way now to be on the safe side (calculation of image) - even it
takes me much longer...For the evaluation I use evalglare, is pretty
simple to use for such cases.

For reflections I already did it in that way and I used a modified
version of evalglare (will put it online soon) to calculate the angle
between different glare sources (in that case between reflection and
sun), too. The only disadvantage is the long calculation time of several
days (1 image (ab0)+evaluation takes 6 sec -> 2.5 days on a single core
for one point..and I have 33 points and two geometries...).

Jan
